string-array.name: local_conditions
string-array.item: Danger! Low flying houses
Bad weather, but still somewhere nice
Hang on to your hats, its a biggy
Igor, the winch. Catch the lightening
Angry Thor make lights and noise
Falling water and flakes
Falling water and slush
Falling flakes, then water
Still not raining properly, despite the cold
Can not be bothered to rain properly
Still raining despite the cold
I\'m singing in the rain, or not
I\'m singing in the rain, or not
Like nature\'s dandruff
Bits of flakes here and there
Flakes going horizontal
Christmassy if December, miserable if not
Frozen rain
Melting flakes
Where is this, the desert?
No idea, cannot see a bloody thing
Look, the sky is poo coloured
Put that fire out!
Hold on to your hats
Hold on to something solid
Cold as a witch\'s tit
Overcast, just like the North
Mostly miserable, but dark
Mostly miserable and dull
Partly miserable, but dark
Partly miserable and dull
If it was day you could see freedom
Great, all the white people are getting naked
Could be worse, if it was not so dark
Could be worse, it could be dark
Water and lumps, where did that come from?
Damn this heat! Oh go on then, lager for me
Isolated thunder, so only me then
Thunder not for everybody, just a few
Thunder not for everybody, just a few
Rain, not for everybody, just a few
Christmassy if December, serious problems if not
Flakes falling here and there
Christmassy if December, serious problems if not
Partly cloudy, your part obviously
Rain and noise everywhere
Come back at Christmas
Rain and noise here and nowhere else
